attributes.action: enforce mobile speed cameras to verify their location
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: by the use of signs forewarning a mobile speedcamera is in use, drivers will become more aware of enforcement in that location and not cause hazardous breaking as is now reported before the mobile speed camera. The mobile speed camera should be verified that it is in use within 5 to 10 seconds from the highest legal speed of approaching the radar range of that camera.

rejection.details: Please provide your full name when submitting your petition.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
